languages.text: "Я буду рядом — до тех пор, пока вы не отвергнете меня".

traits.locale_text: "Я буду рядом — до тех пор, пока вы не отвергнете меня".

languages.text: "I will be with you through everything, if you will have me."
languages.original_text: "Я буду рядом — до тех пор, пока вы не отвергнете меня".

traits.locale_text: "I will be with you for as long as you'll have me."
"I will be with you for as long as you'll have me."
"I will be with you for as long as you'll have me."
"I will be with you for as long as you'll have me."
"I will be with you through everything, if you will have me."

languages.text: “只要你愿意，我就会始终在你身边。”
languages.original_text: "I will be with you through everything, if you will have me."

traits.locale_text: “只要你愿意，我就会永远陪伴你。”

languages.text: "Ich werde mit Euch durch Dick und Dünn gehen, wenn Ihr es zulasst."
languages.original_text: "I will be with you through everything, if you will have me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mit Euch durch Dick und Dünn gehen, wenn Ihr es zulasst."

languages.text: « Je resterai à vos côtés quoi qu'il arrive, tant que vous voudrez bien de moi. »
languages.original_text: "I will be with you through everything, if you will have me."

traits.locale_text: « Je resterai à vos côtés aussi longtemps que vous voudrez de moi. »

languages.text: «Estaré con usted lo que haga falta, si me lo permite».
languages.original_text: "I will be with you through everything, if you will have me."

traits.locale_text: «Estaré con usted lo que haga falta, si me lo permite».

languages.text: 「側に置いてくれるのであれば、何があってもご一緒します」
languages.original_text: "I will be with you through everything, if you will have me."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが私を望む限り、私はあなたと一緒にいます」
